Description.val: Handles the Range, Locate, Sort and Print Data internal events

Comment.val: This component provides an interface for the user to perform Range, Locate, Sort and Print Data.The component does not expose any object. It has logic units for handling the Range, Locate, Sort and Print Data internal events.The source code for this component is available in the Add_On\UserFunctionality directory, so you can customize the screens of the component as you wish.

DataObject.Comment: Individual Rights field added by Sachin 02022021
DataObject.name: RightsMaster

ExpSyntax.val: '[ { "name": "User Master", "url": "/Home/UsersList","icon": "vendorico" }, { "name": "Rights Master", "url": "/Home/RightsMaster","icon": "doctrackico" }, { "name": "Group Master", "url": "/Home/GroupMaster","icon": "docico" }, { "name": "Assign Rights To Groups", "url": "/Home/AssignRightsToaGroup","icon": "csico" }, { "name": "User Rights/Groups", "url": "/Home/UserRightsGroups","icon": "loandetailsico" } ]'

Hint.valUnicode: Search By Rights Key, Rights Name

STP.TXT: Cannot deactivate group, Used in other tables
Are you sure to delete selected right?
